short_summary: Supply and delivery Gas Transmission Analyzer
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery Gas Transmission Analyzer. The Gas Transmission Analyzer controls the humidity and temperature of the test gas enabling determination of the gas transmission rate.
duration_in_months: But British Columbia is this alot right
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement:** Gas Transmission Analyzer
-------------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Reference Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-451-60781343
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-58066/B
* **Publish Date:** January 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024, 14:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity Name:** National Research Council Canada (NRC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 1200 Montreal Road, Building M-55, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Roberta Ranaldi
	+ Email: [Roberta.Ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Roberta.Ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 299-8229

### Tender Description

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) requires a Gas Transmission Analyzer to control the humidity and temperature of test gas, enabling the determination of gas transmission rate.

**Documents:**

You can find the tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), Amendment 1, and Notice of Procurement Process (NPP), at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29950/23-58066b_rfp_gas-transmission-analyzer_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29950/23-58066b_rfp_analyseur-de-transmission-de-gaz_fr.pdf
* English Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29950/23-58066b_amdt01_gas-transmission-analyzer.pdf
* French Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29950/23-58066b_amdt01_gas-transmission-analyzer.pdf
* English NPP: https://canadabuys.canada
